article.title: Status and history for Venda [ven]
article.para: No known problem at this time.

history.history-entry: Converted HTML entities to plain Unicode. Thanks to Adam Twardoch.
This translation is no longer available on the OHCHR site. It has been replaced and the new translation is available as [ven2].
stage 4: XML version contributed by Emmanuel Vallois.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source.
